headline.main: Knox Defends Ban on U-Boat News As Necessary to Protect Our Security

lead_paragraph: RALEIGH, N.C., Nov. 13 -- Secretary Knox, In a letter to a Raleigh newspaper publisher, stood fast on his assertion that the Navy would not give out the news if a German submarine were sunk.
abstract: Sec Knox defends ban on U-boat news, lr to pub J A Park
snippet: RALEIGH, N.C., Nov. 13 -- Secretary Knox, In a letter to a Raleigh newspaper publisher, stood fast on his assertion that the Navy would not give out the news if a German submarine were sunk....
